channel.title: Opinion on Jordan Herzstein
channel.description: Recent content in Opinion on Jordan Herzstein

item.title: Mass Online Social Engineering, Canada's Sovereignty, and Electoral Interference: A Canadian Perspective
item.description: Sharing my fears of tech oligarchy employing mass disinformation campaigns to destabalize Canada, and the small things we can do to combat it.
